name: Rishi
whyJoin:
I want to join Flux because it is a community where creativity, technology, and collaboration come together. My motivation is to learn new skills, explore innovative ideas, and grow by working with like-minded peers. I am deeply interested in areas like software development, AI/ML, and building impactful projects that solve real problems.

Through Flux, I hope to contribute my enthusiasm, teamwork, and problem-solving mindset. I may not have much experience right now in some fields like AI/ML, but I am eager to learn and actively participate in projects, discussions, and events. I want to contribute fresh ideas, support ongoing initiatives, and bring energy and dedication to the team.
softSkills: I believe my soft skills make me both a good learner and a supportive teammate. I can communicate clearly
and also listen to others. I enjoy working in a team
and solving problems with creative and practical solutions. I manage my time well
and always keep an open mind to learn new things and try out fresh ideas.
hardSkills: I have knowledge of programming languages like C
Java and JavaScript. I am familiar with web development using the MERN stack (MongoDB
Node.js) and have also worked with HTML
I have experience using Git/GitHub for version control and tools like VS Code for development.

name: Divya Jha

I'm very interested in learning about the newest developments in computing and technology, and I think FLUX offers the ideal setting for both learning and putting concepts into practice through creativity and teamwork.  
My desire to go beyond what I learn in the classroom and obtain real-world experience—whether through projects, gatherings, or conversations that push me to think outside the box—is what drives me.  As I think their advice and experience will help me develop both academically and personally, I also look forward to interacting with seniors and peers who share my interests.

name: Jai Kumar Singh

whyJoin:
What excites me most about joining FLUX is the opportunity to be part of a vibrant community where creativity, technology, and research converge to drive meaningful innovation. I am motivated by the chance to gain hands-on experience in cutting-edge fields like AI/ML, Cybersecurity, Web Development, and Computer Vision, and to apply theoretical knowledge to practical projects. FLUX’s focus on mentorship, collaboration, and exposure to emerging technologies inspires me, as I want to learn from experts, work alongside like-minded peers, and contribute to impactful projects.

I am particularly drawn to FLUX’s commitment to fostering a culture of exploration and innovation, where setbacks are seen as learning opportunities and teamwork is a strength. I believe joining FLUX will allow me to cultivate my skills, think critically about real-world problems, and grow as a technologist and leader, while contributing positively to a community that values creativity, research, and meaningful collaboration.

name: Abhigyan Vardhan Singh
society: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) Student Branch MMMUT (IEEE-STB MMMUT)
whyJoin:
I would like to join Flux because I see it as a space where I can combine my curiosity for research with opportunities to learn, grow, and contribute meaningfully. I am deeply interested in exploring and researching diverse topics—particularly medieval European history, ancient history, modern history, geopolitics, and military history. Alongside my academic interests, I am also passionate about technology, with experience in web development and currently advancing my skills in Data Structures and Algorithms using C++.

Joining Flux would allow me to not only gather valuable information and insights but also to engage in discussions that broaden perspectives. I look forward to forging meaningful connections with seniors and peers, gaining mentorship, and developing both my soft and hard skills through active participation.

Most importantly, I am committed to contributing with sincerity, responsibility, and enthusiasm. I assure you that I will approach every task assigned to me with dedication and will never step back unless there is a very strong, genuine reason.

Through Flux, I hope to grow as a learner and as a contributor, while adding value to the community that the club fosters.

name: Prakhar Shukla
society: currently i am not a part of any society
whyJoin:
My interests lie in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and coding with a strong focus on problem solving through DSA. I am also curious about how these domains connect with others like web development and cybersecurity, and I enjoy exploring how technology can be combined to build complete systems.

My motivation to join Flux comes from the desire to learn collaboratively in a community where innovation is encouraged, and where I can grow alongside peers who share the same passion for technology.

I hope to contribute to Flux by actively participating in coding contests, workshops, and technical projects, sharing my knowledge with peers, and eventually mentoring juniors. I also want to help in building impactful projects that can represent Flux in hackathons and competitions, strengthening the society’s presence both within and outside the college.
softSkills: I consider myself a good team player who can collaborate effectively and communicate ideas clearly. I’m adaptable to new situations
and persistent when solving problems. I also bring organizational skills
and a positive attitude that helps me work well in groups and stay focused on long-term goals.
hardSkills: My hard skills include problem solving through Data Structures and Algorithms

name: Rohan Jaiswal

I want to join Flux because it match with my interest in deep computer science research and solving real problems. I am really interested in systems programming, algorithms and low level optimization, and I enjoy exploring new ideas which connect theory with real world use. i feel that flux can be a good society for  working on research based ideas and it is a great place for me to share my skills and also learn more.

I want to contribute by bringing new research based ideas, specially in areas like energy efficient algorithms, system level optimization and low latency computing. My goal is to work with others in the community to create practical solutions and useful tools that can help not just Flux, but also the wider tech world.

and guiding teams toward achieving shared goals. I am adaptable

with experience in competitive programming and core data structures such as arrays
and graphs. I am familiar with basic web development frameworks like Node.js
and have a general understanding of backend development
and database integration. I presented "Kaam Se Kaam" at I-Expo — an online labor hiring platform connecting laborers with employers efficiently. My research interests include algorithm optimization

and optimization techniques for interview readiness.

name: Kushagra Modanwal
whyJoin: I want to join Flux to be part of a community of innovators and researchers where I can contribute my technical knowledge while learning from like minded peers. I have an idea for a Machine Learning project aimed at automating document digitization. Many people take photos of documents that are skewed or shadowed, and existing scanning apps require manual cleanup. My project proposes using AI and Computer Vision for document detection, perspective correction, background removal, and image enhancement, producing clean, scan like outputs automatically. I hope to research this idea further at Flux, develop a working tool, and contribute to the community with my findings and projects.
softSkills: I think I have good problem-solving and critical thinking skills. I can communicate well and work in a team without much trouble. I’m also flexible and can manage my time
even when I have to learn new stuff and work on different projects at the same time. I like coming up with creative ideas
taking the lead on small tasks
and working with friends to reach common goals. I usually try to stay curious and persistent
and I use my analytical thinking to figure out problems the best I can.
hardSkills: I have experience with programming languages like  C
Python and right now I’m learning React.js for web development. I’m comfortable using tools like Git and GitHub. I enjoy building websites and small apps
and improving my technical skills. At the moment
I’m also learning Machine Learning to get better at AI and data-driven applications. On top of that
I’m working on a research idea for automated document digitization using Computer Vision and AI techniques.
